name: 2024 8th International Conference on Computer, Software and Modeling
content: Publication: Submissions will be reviewed by at least two conference technical committees or international reviewers, and accepted papers will be published into Conference Publishing Services (CPS), and submitted to IEEE Xplore for indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus Index, etc. Some selected papers will be sent to the editorial board of JSW for further review after being extended with at least 40% new content, and accepted papers will be published in Journal of Software, which will be indexed by DBLP, EBSCO, DOAJ, ProQuest, INSPEC, WorldCat, CNKI,etc.
organizers: Université de Haute-Alsace (UHA) and École supérieure d'informatique, électronique, automatique (ESI
